flawed_nl_solution:
The area of the largest room is 45 ft x 30 ft = <<45*30=1350>>1350 sq ft
The area of the smallest room is 15 ft x 8 ft = <<15*8=102>>102 sq ft
The difference between the two is 1350 sq ft - 102 sq ft = <<1350-102=1248>>1248 sq ft
#### 1248

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 102. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
